text.div:
CarePlanIntent

Codes indicating the degree of authority/intentionality associated with a care plan

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/care-plan-intent defines the following codes:

Code Display Definition
proposal Proposal The care plan is a suggestion made by someone/something that doesn't have an intention to ensure it occurs and without providing an authorization to act
plan Plan The care plan represents an intention to ensure something occurs without providing an authorization for others to act
order Order The care plan represents a request/demand and authorization for action
option Option The care plan represents a component or option for a RequestGroup that establishes timing, conditionality and/or other constraints among a set of requests. Refer to [[[RequestGroup]]] for additional information on how this status is used

name: CarePlanIntent
description: Codes indicating the degree of authority/intentionality associated with a care plan

concept.definition: The care plan is a suggestion made by someone/something that doesn't have an intention to ensure it occurs and without providing an authorization to act
The care plan represents an intention to ensure something occurs without providing an authorization for others to act
The care plan represents a request/demand and authorization for action

The care plan represents a component or option for a RequestGroup that establishes timing, conditionality and/or other constraints among a set of requests.

Refer to [[[RequestGroup]]] for additional information on how this status is used
